definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Her stories and essays have been published in The New Yorker, Zoetrope: All-Story, Best American Short Stories, and elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 其小說和散文已發表在《紐約客》西洋鏡欄目的有。

sentences.english: Make diagrams of each diorama with labeled sketches.
sentences.chinese: 使圖表的每一個西洋鏡與標記寫生。
